personalInfo.name: Alex Johnson
personalInfo.title: Frontend Developer Intern
personalInfo.summary: Passionate frontend developer with experience in React, JavaScript, and modern web technologies. Seeking to leverage skills in creating responsive and accessible web applications.

experience.description: Developed responsive web applications using React and TypeScript. Collaborated with design team to implement accessible UI components and improve user experience.
Built and maintained websites for local non-profits. Implemented responsive designs and optimized site performance.
Led frontend development for club projects. Mentored junior members in React and modern CSS techniques.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: E-Commerce Dashboard
projects.description: Built a responsive admin dashboard with React and Chart.js for data visualization. Implemented real-time sales tracking, inventory management, and customer analytics features.

projects.name: Weather Application
projects.description: Developed a weather application with location-based forecasts and interactive maps. Features include 7-day forecasts, weather alerts, and favorite locations.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Created a collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, and team collaboration features.
